alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 21 at 9:59PM PST until December 23 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM WEDNESDAY TO 4 PM PST THURSDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 4000 feet mainly near the crest. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 15 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades mainly impacting the crest. * WHEN...From 10 AM Wednesday to 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are possible. This may impact morning and evening commutes Wednesday and Thursday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades
